other_tests.findings: Genetic investigations identified a loss of methylation (LOM) of the KCNQ1OT1:TSS DMR (or Imprinting Centre 2, IC2) in both twins, confirming the clinical diagnosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In a follow-up analysis, methylation levels for IC2 LOM were confirmed in ST using DNA from buccal mucosa by pyrosequencing, while FT's methylation level was comparable to normal controls.

other_tests.findings: An adrenal cystic mass was discovered in ST.
